channel.title: -- Essence (iClarity Base) --
channel.description:
This is my first ever private server (Excluding the shitty 562 I renamed.:/) Please don't flame, but if you do I really don't care.
[b]- Some information -[/b] Server Base: iClarity v1.5 by Primadude Client Base: iClarity Client by Primadude Revision: 317-377
[b]- Client - (Not really going to change much...)[/b] * Added some interfaces
[b]- Server -[/b] * 99% Gem Cutting (Need help with timers.) * 88% Herblore (Pot Making) * 100% Dragon Dagger poisoning * 100% Prayer Sounds [s](Need help with timers...I fail with them..if you want to help/give info about timers: icecreamcoder@live.com)[/s] that's pretty much it at the moment, therefore no pictures...:?
[b]- Update Log -[/b] [code] [8/1/10/7:05PM]: -1 absX/absY coord glitch. (Description Below) [/code]
[b]- absX/absY Bug -[/b] The glitch happened to me and I have NO IDEA how it happened, but I checked my character file and saw that my absyX/absY coords were -1, so in the login method I made it check for coords, and if they were -1 it would teleport you to home.

item.title: -- Essence (iClarity Base) --
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

This is my first ever private server (Excluding the shitty 562 I renamed.:/) Please don’t flame, but if you do I really don’t care.

- Some information -
Server Base: iClarity v1.5 by Primadude
Client Base: iClarity Client by Primadude
Revision: 317-377

- Client - (Not really going to change much…)

  • Added some interfaces

- Server -

  • 99% Gem Cutting (Need help with timers.)
  • 88% Herblore (Pot Making)
  • 100% Dragon Dagger poisoning
  • 100% Prayer Sounds (Need help with timers…I fail with them…if you want to help/give info about timers: icecreamcoder@live.com)
    that’s pretty much it at the moment, therefore no pictures…:?

- Update Log -

[8/1/10/7:05PM]: -1 absX/absY coord glitch. (Description Below)

- absX/absY Bug -
The glitch happened to me and I have NO IDEA how it happened, but I checked my character file and saw that my absyX/absY coords were -1, so in the login method I made it check for coords, and if they were -1 it would teleport you to home.

Read full topic
